entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows service crashes on system shutdown #36802
  • Self-contained Microsoft.WindowsDesktop-targeting app is published with whole WPF and WinForms frameworks which are not used #36790
  • The .NET 8 SDK installer recommends Visual Studio 17.7 when it should recommend 17.8 #36785

Closed

  • [Package Validation] We should support excluding tfms when running the validation #22901
    Backlog
  • Can't install MAUI workload for iOS and MacOs on Windows #36653

PullRequests

Created

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36748
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2313141 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add packagesprops template #36387
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
